meanings.definition: Thinking about or planning the future with imagination or wisdom.
meanings.sent1: The young artist had a visionary idea for a new painting.
meanings.sent2: She admired the visionary approach of the architect in designing the building.
meanings.sent3: The visionary chef decided to create a dish using only purple ingredients.
meanings.sent4: Her visionary thinking led to a revolutionary solution for the company.
meanings.sent5: The visionary concept of time travel captured everyone's imagination.

meanings.definition: A person with original ideas about what the future will or could be like.
meanings.sent1: The tech visionary predicted the rise of virtual reality technology.
meanings.sent2: Many consider Steve Jobs to be a visionary in the field of technology.
meanings.sent3: The visionary at the company meeting suggested having a pet day at work.
meanings.sent4: She was a visionary in the world of fashion, always ahead of trends.
meanings.sent5: The young inventor proved to be a visionary with his groundbreaking invention.
